Latest COVID-19 Update

Lockdown 2.0

Here you can find the latest information on how learning to drive with checkmirrors has changed due to Corona Virus.

Lessons are delayed

Due to government lockdown, lessons are currently delayed from taking place until December 2nd.

Wear a mask

To ensure the safety of both students and our instructors, wearing a face mask is required at all times.

Clean cars

A further step to make learning to drive safer with checkmirrors, we now clean each of our cars thoroughly between lessons.

Clean hands

We provide hand sanitiser in all of our cars and kindly request students to use the hand sanitiser before each lesson.

Don't worry, you can still book your driving lesson, please note this bookings may be delayed until after lockdown has been lifted.

Book from only £28 per hour or 10 lessons for £270

FAQs

Here are some of our most frequently asked Questions.

Currently, due to the new government lockdown, we are unable to provide driving lessons until December 2nd. Don’t worry you can still book your driving lessons with checkmirrors, simply call 07821 291 783 or book online. It may take a while before we can resume driving lessons as we will be following government guidance and national and local lockdown rules.

Yes, we are still be accepting new students. We will ask you some questions covid related questions prior to your first lesson to make sure you’re feeling well and able. Please contact us here or via our Facebook page

Here at checkmirrors we have several procedures in place to protect our students and driving instructors alike, which we review regularly in line with government guidance.

  • All students and driving instructors must wear a face mask or covering at all times
  • All cars are thoroughly cleaned between each lesson
  • Hand sanitiser is provided in all of our cars

Data Privacy

Checkmirrors values your data privacy. We will only ever use your data to contact you about specific enquiries made unless otherwise agreed. Your data will never be disclosed to or used by another business or external third party. By clicking submit, you agree to allow checkmirrors to contact you about your above enquiry.
